auto_story_text_normalized: we went to the park and saw a lot of interesting things . the water was so calm and peaceful . the beach was very empty and cold . the buildings were covered in snow . the roads were clear and the weather was nice .

edited_stories.edited_story_text: We went on a trip and saw a lot of interesting things. The first village we passed through was very calm and peaceful. However, the park we stopped at wasn't exactly welcoming - it was so empty and cold. The abandoned buildings we explored spooked me out. We didn't see very many people on the roads.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: we went to the park and saw a lot of interesting things that day . the water was so calm and peaceful due to no boats being out. the beach was very empty and cold but that didn't stop us from going . the buildings were covered in snow which was expected due to it being winter . the roads were clear and the weather was nice so we drove fast.
